Student Projects

This page highlights the innovative work of our talented students from the Data Science Certificate program or the Masters in Data Science and Analytics. Projects span a diverse range from academic research, community collaborations, and real-world applications, demonstrating the impact and creativity of our upcoming data professionals. Each project is linked directly to a Github repository with more details about the project, including if the project has good next steps that can be built on by another person.

Building an R package

Saul Mooradian

The CFO Office Sign-in Dashboard App
This project is a web application developed using Shiny, an R package for building interactive web applications, enabling dynamic data presentation and user interaction.
Juan Cortes
